entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High 17. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CST Monday 8 May 2023
